name: Water-Melanie: The Melon Menace
description:
A Tale As Old As Time.
Don't. Look. Behind you.
The pigeons are coming. And you're filled to the brim with seeds.
For god's sakes, Mel.
RUN.
Water-Melanie: The Melon Menace is, by all accounts, the worst. Stealing shoelaces, tackling teddy bears... a real nuisance, frankly. But nobody deserves to go out like this. Slingshot your way towards freedom in this gripping high-stakes action game. Can you think quickly enough to save ol' Mel from a truly horrific demise? Or will your efforts be... for the birds?

How To Play!

Click the tiny blue hands stuck to the bookshelf with your 2 long sticky hands and then windback and let go to slingshot Water-Melanie! Gain points by hitting the pink teddy bears but watch out, they'll knock you back into the angry pigeon crowd.
